Package cs2810.group30.oaxacabackend.services

Class OrderServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
cs2810.group30.oaxacabackend.services.OrderServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
OrderService
@Service public class OrderServiceImpl extends Object implements OrderService
Implementation of OrderRepo and OrderService which provides methods for the controller.

    • saveOrder

      public Orders saveOrder(Orders order)
      Saves the order to the database (generates the OrderID randomly), returns the Order added to the database.
      Specified by:
      saveOrder in interface OrderService
      Parameters:
      order - the order item to be added to the db (if the provided order has a UID it will be overwritten.
      Returns:
      The order saved to the db (with new UID).

    • getAllOrders

      public List<Orders> getAllOrders()
      Returns all orders in the database sorted by completionStatus (in alphabetical order).
      Specified by:
      getAllOrders in interface OrderService
      Returns:
      A list of all of the Orders in the db sorted by completionStatus.

    • getOrder

      public Optional<Orders> getOrder(String id)
      Returns a specific order associated with the Id given, or an empty Optional if no such order with that ID exists..
      Specified by:
      getOrder in interface OrderService
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the order that should be returned.
      Returns:
      An Optional which contains the order that's associated with the given ID, Optional is empty if the ID was not valid.

    • changeStatus

      public Orders changeStatus(String id, String newStatus)
      Finds an order by it's ID and changes it's completionStatus to match newStatus, returns null if the ID is not valid.
      Specified by:
      changeStatus in interface OrderService
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the order to change the completionStatus of.
      newStatus - The newStatus that'll overwrite the previous completionStatus
      Returns:
      The new Order saved to the db, or null if the ID is not valid.

    • deleteOrder

      public boolean deleteOrder(String id)
      Finds the order associated with the ID and deletes it.
      Specified by:
      deleteOrder in interface OrderService
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the order to be deleted.
      Returns:
      True if the order is deleted, or false if it couldn't be (because the ID isn't valid).

    • deleteAll

      public void deleteAll()
      Deletes all orders in the repo, also deletes all Order items.
      Specified by:
      deleteAll in interface OrderService

    • getAllByStatus

      public List<Orders> getAllByStatus(String status)
      Returns a list of all of the orders that match the completionStatus provided in order from oldest to newest.
      Specified by:
      getAllByStatus in interface OrderService
      Parameters:
      status - The completionStatus that you want to search by.
      Returns:
      A List of all orders with completionStatus matching status, in order from oldest to newest.

    • changeWaiterName

      public Orders changeWaiterName(String id, String newWaiterName)
      Changes the waiterName field of the order with the corresponding id to whatever is provided as newWaiterName.
      Specified by:
      changeWaiterName in interface OrderService
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the Order to have it's waiter field changed.
      newWaiterName - The string that will replace the previous waiter name.
      Returns:
      The changed order.
